refnamediv.refpurpose: Searches through the one-line usage messages for each mged command and displays the name of each command where a match is found.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The apropos command searches through the one-line usage messages for specified mged commands and displays the commands that match.

example.title: List all commands having "region" in their one-line usage messages.
